d: This design is used in the tutorial

s.biasTapeLength.d: To finish the edge, you will need {{{ l }}} of [bias tape](/docs/sewing/bias-tape)
s.fabricNeeded: You need a {{{ w }}} by {{{ h }}} piece of [suitable fabric](/docs/designs/bob/fabric) to make this bib
s.finishWithBiasTape: Finish raw edge with bias tape

neckRatio.d: Controls the size of the neck opening relative to the bib size

widthRatio.d: Controls the width of the bib

lengthRatio.d: Controls the length of the bib

headSize.d: The head circumference you want the bib to accommodate
